|cpu1_cores = |cpu1_type = |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 200 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Intel;E28F800B5B70; |flash1size = 1 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 4 |ram1chip = ISSI;IS41C16100S-50K; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = LevelOne;LXT970AQC; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8019AS; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 10MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:30:AB,00:A0:C5 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, DE-9 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = 1234 |manuf = ZyXEL |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/03/2000 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 606449004175 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00004SYLI |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The native OS for this device appears to be '''ZyNOS'''. The manufacturer is presumed to be '''ZyXEL'''. The '''Samsung''' CPU used in this device has a P/N of S3C4500X01-QERO. ==Links of Interest== [ftp://downloads.netgear.com/files/314v320a.zip Latest firmware] (also usable with the [[Netgear RT314]])
[http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/rt311ref.pdf Manual] [http://www.bettina-attack.de/jonny/view.php/gadgets/soho_routers/ Gadgets - uClinux on SOHO routers] (good quality board images) :"Made in Taiwan", "Router-CBAD" and "P/N:45-401-000111" appears to be silkscreened on the board. [http://www.amazon.com/Netgear-RT311-Internet-Gateway-Router/dp/B00004SYLI/ref=sr_1_1?s=electronics&ie=UTF8&qid=1353297949&sr=1-1&keywords=RT311 On Amazon] (reviews) [[Category:English Documentation]]
